title: Full Time YouTube Content Creator – $700/month (Long Term Job)
job_overview:
Hey lovely people - we have a new full-time job opening - see details below!

Job position: Female YouTube Content Creator (not a video editor!)
Pay: $700/month
Schedule: Full-time, long-term job (Monday to Friday 8-9 hrs daily)
Output: 10-15 long-form YouTube videos/week, ~10?minutes each
Location: Remote

What You'll Do
Appear on camera using a webcam talking about online business tools and strategies (training provided).

Deliver engaging, high-energy videos in English - confident, clear, and charismatic.

Follow our strategy and guidance (full training provided.)

Optional basic video edit skills (e.g. trimming intros/outros) is a nice-to-have - but not mandatory

Must-Have Skills
Fluent English (speaking & writing) with strong on-camera presence

Confidence and personality: DON’T sound robotic or dull

Reliable full-time commitment - this is a full time job - not a gig

Comfortable filming yourself daily for YouTube videos about online business

Why Join Us?
Steady monthly salary, stable UK business

Supportive setup: strategy, scripts, coaching all provided

Equipment covered: webcam purchase offered if needed

Once again, this job is for FEMALE content creator only. And also if you can make basic YouTube webcam videos and have a really good level of English (speaking and writing)! Also you must be available FULL TIME 40-50 hours per week.

How to apply: send us an email into Upgrade to see actual info
No need for CV - better send us some video examples or videos that you have created yourself as UGC creator (long form or short form for YouTube, TikTok or Instagram).

P.S. we've been hiring people from Philippines for 7 years, some have worked for us for 5 years full time, so we are nice people and get along really well. Looking forward to speak to you!
